function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Disengaged employees can impact on the guest experience and the business loses not only money but reputation as a result.","Impact":"Loss of money and reputation, negative impact on guest experience.","Mitigation":"Constantly seeking feedback from talent and employees, improving their experience, and ensuring they are engaged in the business.","Technologies":"Employee feedback platforms, engagement surveys, performance management software.","People":"Employees, guests, business owners.","Owner":"Human resources, management."},{"Description":"Talent turnover costs the business in both money and time.","Impact":"Financial loss and disruption of operations due to the need to find and develop new talent.","Mitigation":"Improving working environment, providing opportunities for growth and development, seeking feedback from employees to address dissatisfaction.","Technologies":"Employee retention software, talent management systems, training and development platforms.","People":"Management, employees, business owners.","Owner":"Human resources, management."}]}
